title: 88/326/EEC: Commission Decision of 12 April 1988 allocating to the United Kingdom resources to be charged to the 1988 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks to designated organizations for distribution to the most deprived persons in the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 12 April 1988
allocating to the United Kingdom resources to be charged to the 1988 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks to designated organizations for distribution to the most deprived persons in the Community
(88/326/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. The allocation of the resources referred to in Article 10 of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3744/87 shall be made as follows:
- United Kingdom: 15 million ECU.
This sum shall be converted into national currency at the rate applicable on 4 January 1988 and published in the Official Journal of the European Communities, Series C.
2. Subject to the limit set out in paragraph 1, the follwing quantities of produce may be withdrawn, from intervention, for distribution in the United Kingdom:
- up to 3 000 tonnes of butter,
- up to 2 000 tonnes of beef.
3. The withdrawals referred to in paragraph 2 may be made from 5 April 1988.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States. It is applicable from 15 December 1987.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 April 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
